function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Changes in compliance indicator associated with changes in infection rates","Impact":"Increased infection rates due to lack of compliance with measures","Mitigation":"Improving public awareness and understanding of the importance of compliance with mitigation measures","Technologies":"Public health education and awareness campaigns","People":"General public","Owner":"Public health organizations"},{"Description":"Reduction of restrictions leading to increased infections","Impact":"Surge in infection rates due to relaxed restrictions on gatherings","Mitigation":"Implementing targeted measures to control gatherings and enforcing compliance with guidelines","Technologies":"Tracking and monitoring technology, enforcement measures","People":"Local government, law enforcement, public health authorities","Owner":"Local government, public health authorities"},{"Description":"Divergent trends in infection rates despite similar community mitigation measures","Impact":"Inconsistent effectiveness of mitigation measures in different states","Mitigation":"Conducting further research to understand the factors contributing to divergent trends and adapting mitigation strategies accordingly","Technologies":"Epidemiological modeling, data analysis","People":"Epidemiologists, public health researchers","Owner":"Research institutions, public health organizations"}]}
